name: Brutal Scales
detailed_description:
Brutal Scales is a single player turn based tactic RPG where you can build a party of unique characters in order to fight other club at your high school in order to take over the student council. It won't be easy though as the school is known for have the strongest combatants in the country.

Play as four different class types including Melee, Ranged, caster and healer, each with a different combat strategy and a secondary ability that allows you to do more damage, heal more or do these things as an area effect.

You can recruit characters by talking to them or doing missions and weapons can be obtained by defeating the clubs indifferent ways such as beating them with a certain amount of people on your team or doing a one hit kill.
